name: Dr. Venugopal K R
text: E-Cell UVCE has transformed the entrepreneurial culture on campus. Students are now thinking beyond traditional career paths and exploring innovative solutions to real-world problems.

name: Rahul Verma
text: The mentorship and resources I received from E-Cell were instrumental in launching my startup. The network I built here continues to be invaluable.

name: Kavya Prasad
text: E-Cell's workshops and speaker sessions opened my eyes to the startup ecosystem. I'm now confident about pursuing my entrepreneurial dreams.

name: Sanjay Gupta
text: As an investor, I'm impressed by the quality of ideas coming from E-Cell UVCE. These students are solving real problems with innovative approaches.

name: Nisha Reddy
text: The Startup Incubation Program gave me the structure and support I needed. From ideation to MVP, E-Cell was with me every step of the way.
